### Understanding Liver Health

The liver is one of the most vital organs in the human body, performing a wide array of functions vital for survival. It processes nutrients, filters toxins, and produces bile to aid in digestion. Given its importance, maintaining liver health is essential. Factors such as poor diet, excessive alcohol consumption, and sedentary lifestyles can lead to liver issues, including fatty liver disease and cirrhosis.
